message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000.  It's a great deal, and I believe it would be very valuable to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am looking for a better deal. I am willing to pay $14000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $14500 for the product.  It's a fair price, considering the value it offers. Let's make this happen!
